description:
A demon girl who exterminates demons. She has a contract with Shuu. Only a few humans know that she is a demon, and she normally spends her days attending high school in Bayron City as a human girl. Even when there is no work, she visits Shuu`s house which doubles as their office to support Shuu both professionally and privately. She is extremely possessive of Shuu as she has a contract with him. She hates any woman who approaches Shuu, and sometimes even tries to get rid of them...
Source: Official page
name: Kisara
